page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: IN THIS AREA THERE ARE A GOOD SELECTION OF SCHOOLS,MOST OF THEM BUILT SINCE THE 2ND WORLD WAR. IN THE STATE PRIMARY SECTOR THERE ARE SEPARATE INFANT AND JUNIOR SCHOOLS AND COMBINED JUNIOR AND INFANT SCHOOLS.SOME OF THESE SCHOOLS ALSO HAVE NURSERY CLASSES FOR CHILDREN BETWEEN THREE AND FIUVE YEARS.THE STATE SECONDARY SCHOOLS ARE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS FOR PUPILS FROM 11 TO 18 YEARS.IN ADDITION THERE ARE SEVERAL PRIVATE SCHOOLS TO CHOOSE FROM.THESE INCLUDE NURSERY SCHOOLS,PREPARATORY SCHOOLS AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS,ONE OF WHICH (THE ROYAL MASONIC SCHOOL FOR GIRLS) HAS BOARDING FACILITIES.SCHOOLS IN THE AREA HAVE GOOD SPORTING AND ACADEMIC REPUTATIONS AND PARENTS ARE ABLE TO CHOOSE WHICH SCHOOLS THEY WANT THEIR CHILDREN TO ATTEND.
